text:
Do any HubSpotters know if there is a plan to make "app uninstall webhooks" available to app partners?

Use case: when someone uninstalls our app, we want to delete the record from our database so that we don't run into issues if a different user on their team tries to install it.
I know that <@U03JDEHCX17> would also like this feature
i saw the thread and didn't see a good solution yet.

The email sent to customers and <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Releases-and-Updates/Important-changes-to-HubSpot-s-Asset-Marketplace/ba-p/692866?utm_campaign=customer-marketing&utm_medium=email&utm_content=227892847&utm_source=hs_automation|this announcement> in the HubSpot community have created a lot of concern for "theme" customers thinking they are no longer being supported - as a theme developer, the distinction between marketplace themes and the old templates, modules, and packs is clear, but the messaging provided is causing a flurry of support tickets.

I think a simple visual like this would help clear up the confusion, just something to instruct them where to find their downloads, which items are supported (themes) and which will not be moving forward.
